DOC.brief_summary: Primary purpose : To early detect cardiac allograft vasculopathy identify patient high risk cardiac event , couple analysis kinetics brain natriuretic peptide ( BNP ) leave ventricle ( LV ) dobutamine stress echocardiography . Hypothesis : Plasma BNP elevation abnormality LV kinetic ESD , associate presence allograft vasculopathy arisen cardiovascular event .
DOC.brief_title: Cardiac Allograft Vasculopathy Dobutamine Stress Echocardiography / Brain Natriuretic Peptide Coupling
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Heart transplant recipient Exclusion criterion : No respect inclusion criterion Pregnancy Severe renal failure ( creatinin clearance < equal 30 ml/min ) Dobutamine stress echocardiography contraindication
